item.description:
I’m a clinical dietitian, currently finishing my PhD at the University of Bergen. In my project I have used animal and human data to explore the regulation of one-carbon metabolism and B-vitamin status, with a focus on the activation of PPAR alpha and dietary macronutrient composition. My main academic interests are the methodology and statistical methods used in nutritional epidemiology. My main research tool is R and RStudio, where I do all my statistical analyses and writing. See my full CV here

Beside work I’m a big sports fan. My main sport is volleyball, where I’ve been active since the age of 15. I’m currently coaching the mens recruit team at TIF Viking, as well as scouting and performing statistical analyses for the mens first team. My musical preference is hard rock and related genres.
